name: srrdb
description:
This will change:
1. Green background / blue text -------> grey

2. Fix CRC column escaping beyond the border on the right. better spacing.

3. Fix text overlap (when files are big) between 'File size' and 'CRC' columns.
(*Issue may exist only with FireFox 17.0.1 (that i know of / checked) - but in any case if it's there- this will fix it)
